接口的使用
org.springframework.jms.support.converter.MessageConverter

  • 使用MessageConverter的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.jms.config
    Support package for declarative messaging configuration, with Java configuration and XML schema support.
    org.springframework.jms.core
    Core package of the JMS support.
    org.springframework.jms.listener
    This package contains the base message listener container facility.
    org.springframework.jms.listener.adapter
    Message listener adapter mechanism that delegates to target listener methods, converting messages to appropriate message content types (such as String or byte array) that get passed into listener methods.
    org.springframework.jms.listener.endpoint
    This package provides JCA-based endpoint management for JMS message listeners.
    org.springframework.jms.remoting
    Remoting classes for transparent Java-to-Java remoting via a JMS provider.
    org.springframework.jms.support.converter
    Provides a MessageConverter abstraction to convert between Java objects and JMS messages.

    • org.springframework.jms.config中MessageConverter的使用

      参数类型为MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.config中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AbstractJmsListenerContainerFactory.setMessageConverter(MessageConverter messageConverter) 

    • org.springframework.jms.core中MessageConverter的使用

      返回MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MessageConverter JmsMessagingTemplate.getJmsMessageConverter()
      Return the MessageConverter to use to convert a Message from the messaging to and from a Message.
      MessageConverter JmsTemplate.getMessageConverter()
      Return the message converter for this template.
      参数类型为MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.core中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void JmsMessagingTemplate.setJmsMessageConverter(MessageConverter jmsMessageConverter)
      Set the MessageConverter to use to convert a Message from the messaging to and from a Message.
      void JmsTemplate.setMessageConverter(MessageConverter messageConverter)
      Set the message converter for this template.

    • org.springframework.jms.listener中MessageConverter的使用

      返回MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.listener中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MessageConverter AbstractMessageListenerContainer.getMessageConverter() 
      MessageConverter MessageListenerContainer.getMessageConverter()
      Return the MessageConverter that can be used to convert Message, if any.
      参数类型为MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.listener中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AbstractMessageListenerContainer.setMessageConverter(MessageConverter messageConverter)
      Set the MessageConverter strategy for converting JMS Messages.

    • org.springframework.jms.listener.adapter中MessageConverter的使用

      返回MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.listener.adapter中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected MessageConverter AbstractAdaptableMessageListener.getMessageConverter()
      Return the converter that will convert incoming JMS messages to listener method arguments, and objects returned from listener methods back to JMS messages.
      参数类型为MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.listener.adapter中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void AbstractAdaptableMessageListener.setMessageConverter(MessageConverter messageConverter)
      Set the converter that will convert incoming JMS messages to listener method arguments, and objects returned from listener methods back to JMS messages.

    • org.springframework.jms.listener.endpoint中MessageConverter的使用

      返回MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.listener.endpoint中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MessageConverter JmsActivationSpecConfig.getMessageConverter()
      Return the MessageConverter to use, if any.
      MessageConverter JmsMessageEndpointManager.getMessageConverter() 
      参数类型为MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.listener.endpoint中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void JmsActivationSpecConfig.setMessageConverter(MessageConverter messageConverter)
      Set the MessageConverter strategy for converting JMS Messages.

    • org.springframework.jms.remoting中MessageConverter的使用

      参数类型为MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.remoting中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void JmsInvokerClientInterceptor.setMessageConverter(MessageConverter messageConverter)
      Specify the MessageConverter to use for turning RemoteInvocation objects into request messages, as well as response messages into RemoteInvocationResult objects.
      void JmsInvokerServiceExporter.setMessageConverter(MessageConverter messageConverter)
      Specify the MessageConverter to use for turning request messages into RemoteInvocation objects, as well as RemoteInvocationResult objects into response messages.

    • org.springframework.jms.support.converter中MessageConverter的使用

      org.springframework.jms.support.converter中MessageConverter的子接口 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      interface  SmartMessageConverter
      An extended MessageConverter SPI with conversion hint support.
      实现MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.support.converter中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  MappingJackson2MessageConverter
      Message converter that uses Jackson 2.x to convert messages to and from JSON.
      class  MarshallingMessageConverter
      Spring JMS MessageConverter that uses a Marshaller and Unmarshaller.
      class  MessagingMessageConverter
      Convert a Message from the messaging abstraction to and from a Message using an underlying MessageConverter for the payload and a JmsHeaderMapper to map the JMS headers to and from standard message headers.
      class  SimpleMessageConverter
      A simple message converter which is able to handle TextMessages, BytesMessages, MapMessages, and ObjectMessages.
      参数类型为MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.support.converter中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void MessagingMessageConverter.setPayloadConverter(MessageConverter payloadConverter)
      Set the MessageConverter to use to convert the payload.
      参数类型为MessageConverter的org.springframework.jms.support.converter中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MessagingMessageConverter(MessageConverter payloadConverter)
      Create an instance with the specific payload converter.
      MessagingMessageConverter(MessageConverter payloadConverter, JmsHeaderMapper headerMapper)
      Create an instance with the specified payload converter and header mapper.
